entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
